```{r}
x=rnorm(100)
y=rnorm(100)
all.equal(predict(loess(y~x,surface="direct")),loess_fit(x,y))
plot(bench::mark(predict(loess(y~x,surface="direct")),loess_fit(x,y)),type="boxplot")
```

```{r}
x=rnorm(100)
y=x+rnorm(100)
all.equal(supsmu_fit(x,y,span=0.1),supsmu(x,y,span=0.1)$y)
```
